name: ExampleScenario.experimental
title: ExampleScenario.experimental
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: For testing purposes, not real usage
element.definition: A Boolean value to indicate that this example scenario is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.
element.comment: Allows filtering of example scenarios that are appropriate for use versus not.
element.requirements: Enables experimental content to be developed following the same lifecycle that would be used for a production-level example scenario.
